person.headline: Head - Emerging Business - BFSI @ Azentio Software | Customer Engagement
person.summary:
Barkha Menghani is a progressive business leader with over 14 years of experience driving significant growth, customer success, and strategic transformation across the software, retail, and telecommunications sectors. Throughout her career, she has consistently delivered exceptional results, including achieving a churn recovery of $300K and exceeding sales targets by 225% while managing a €12Mn SAP Services business.

At Azentio Software, Barkha has led the global strategy for the Emerging Business Group, overseeing operations in 40 countries and building a scalable, profitable business model. Her leadership has been pivotal in revitalizing customer engagement, driving upsell and cross-sell opportunities, and fostering a culture of excellence within her team.

Barkha’s entrepreneurial spirit is evident in her founding of RAB House Inc., where she successfully grew a distribution and retail business representing top-tier brands like Jockey, Biotique, and Patanjali. Her strategic vision enabled the company to achieve break-even within the first year and expand into a Phygital platform, meeting the evolving needs of her customers.

Her tenure at SAP India further showcases her ability to build strong client relationships, close multi-million-dollar deals, and lead strategic initiatives that have a lasting impact on business growth. Recognized with multiple awards, including the SAP APJ Services Sales Star Award, Barkha’s career is a testament to her commitment to excellence, innovation, and customer-centric leadership.

Beyond her professional accomplishments, Barkha is a dedicated DEI champion who believes in leading with empathy and developing inclusive work cultures that empower everyone to succeed. Her passion for mentoring emerging leaders and creating sustainable value for organizations continues to drive her career forward.

person.headline: Chairman and CEO at ServiceNow
person.location: Santa Clara, California, United States of America
person.summary:
Bill McDermott is Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of ServiceNow – the company with the fastest organic growth in the history of enterprise software. Since Bill joined in late 2019, ServiceNow has more than doubled full-year revenues, while landing for the first time on the Fortune 500 list. 
Before ServiceNow, he was CEO of SAP, the largest European software company. During his tenure, SAP's market value increased from $39 billion to $163 billion. Author of the National Bestseller, Winners Dream, Bill is known for his relentless focus on customer relationships. He is one of the most admired leaders in business, with a successful career spanning iconic brands such as Xerox, Gartner, and Siebel Systems. Currently, Bill serves on the board of directors of Zoom.
Having led through multiple phases of AI innovation, Bill has inspired ServiceNow to embed intelligence across every workflow, while partnering with industry visionaries to accelerate their path towards digital business. Under his leadership, ServiceNow has become the intelligent platform for end-to-end digital transformation – connecting people, process, data, and devices into one platform, with one architecture, and one data model. 
Bill also united all 22,000+ ServiceNow employees under one aspiration: to become the Defining Enterprise Software Company of the 21st century. The company’s hungry and humble culture has been recognized on the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For, Fortune World’s Most Admired Companies, and Glassdoor Best Places to Work lists.

educationHistory.schoolName: Northwestern University - Kellogg School of Management

So employees and customers can be more connected, more innovative, and more agile. And we can all create the future we imagine. The world works with ServiceNow. 

For more information, visit www.servicenow.com.

person.headline: University of Houston + University of Texas at Austin | Researcher. Storyteller. Courage-builder.
person.location: Houston, Texas, United States of America
person.summary:
Dr. Brené Brown is a research professor at the University of Houston, where she holds the Huffington Foundation Endowed Chair at the Graduate College of Social Work. She also holds the position of visiting professor in management at the University of Texas at Austin McCombs School of Business.

Brené has spent the past two decades studying courage, vulnerability, shame, and empathy. She is the author of six #1 New York Times best sellers and is the host of two award-winning podcasts, Unlocking Us and Dare to Lead.

Brené’s books have been translated into more than 30 languages, and her titles include Atlas of the Heart, Dare to Lead, Braving the Wilderness, Rising Strong, Daring Greatly, and The Gifts of Imperfection. With Tarana Burke, she co-edited the best-selling anthology You Are Your Best Thing: Vulnerability, Shame Resilience, and the Black Experience.
Brené’s TED talk on the Power of Vulnerability is one of the top five most-viewed TED talks in the world, with over 60 million views. Brené is the first researcher to have a filmed lecture on Netflix, and in March 2022, she launched a new show on HBO Max that focuses on her latest book, Atlas of the Heart.

Brené spends most of her time working in organizations around the world, helping develop braver leaders and more-courageous cultures.

She lives in Houston, Texas, with her husband, Steve. They have two children, Ellen and Charlie, and a weird Bichon named Lucy.

person.headline: Optimist, New York Times bestselling author of "Start with Why" and "The Infinite Game", and founder of The Optimism Company
person.location: New York, New York, United States of America
person.summary:
Simon Sinek is an unshakable optimist who believes in a bright future and our ability to build it together. Simon's WHY is to inspire people to do what inspires them so that, together, each of us can change our world for the better.

With a vision to change the way businesses think, act, and operate, Simon and his team work with leaders and organizations in nearly every industry to help transform company culture and create a better working world.

As a trained ethnographer, Simon has discovered remarkable patterns about how the greatest leaders and organizations think, act, and communicate. He is fascinated by the people and organizations that make the greatest, lasting impact on the world. He has devoted his life to sharing his thinking, and leading a movement to inspire people to do the things that inspire them.

Simon may be best known for popularizing the concept of WHY in his first Ted Talk in 2009. It has since become one of the most watched talks of all time on TED.com, with 37+ million views. 

Simon is a bestselling author and shares his ideas in the books Start With Why, Leaders Eat Last, Together Is Better, Find Your Why, and The Infinite Game.

Learn more at simonsinek.com.

positionHistory.title: Founder
positionHistory.description: We imagine a world in which all people feel justice is administered with dignity, equity and fairness. The Curve is a 501(c)3 organization dedicated to making this vision a reality. Please visit thecurve.org to learn more.

positionHistory.title: Host, A Bit of Optimism podcast
positionHistory.description:
During these times, we are all having to find new ways to connect. Join me every week as I talk with people that inspire me about love, life, leadership, and silver linings. The hope is that we all leave with something I think we need these days... A Bit of Optimism.

Listen online at https://simonsinek.com/podcast/ or wherever you get your podcasts.

positionHistory.title: Founder and Visionary
positionHistory.description:
We imagine a world where the vast majority of people wake up every day feeling inspired, feel safe at work, and fulfilled at the end of the day. My team and I believe in this bright future and our ability to build it together.

Get tools and resources to inspire at simonsinek.com.

positionHistory.title: Publisher, Optimism Press
positionHistory.description:
Optimism Press is Simon’s publishing imprint with his longtime publisher, Penguin Random House. We have one mission: to publish the ideas that inspire us and give us the tools we need to build a more optimistic world.

We look to the business world, the nonprofit world, the military, politics, education, the clergy, and elsewhere to find authors who can both inspire us and offer us direction on how to build a world in which people feel inspired, safe, and fulfilled in their professional and personal lives. Optimism Press authors challenge our perspectives of how the world works, and offer new tools to help us on our own journey so that together we can build a brighter future. 

For more on the books published by Optimism Press, check out https://simonsinek.com/optimism-press/.

positionHistory.title: Author
positionHistory.description:
Simon is a spark that ignites passion and ideas. He envisions a world in which the vast majority of people wake up every single morning inspired, feel safe wherever they are, and end the day fulfilled by the work they do. As an unshakeable optimist, he believes in our ability to build this world together.

A trained ethnographer, Simon is fascinated by the people and organizations that make the greatest and longest-lasting impact. Over the years, he has discovered some remarkable patterns in how they think, act, and communicate, and also the environments in which people operate at their
natural best.

Simon may be best known for his TED Talk on the concept of WHY, which has been viewed over 60 million times, and his video on millennials in the workplace—which reached 80 million views in its rst week and has gone on to be seen hundreds of millions of times.

He continues to share inspiration through his bestselling books: 
- Start With Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone to Take Action
- Leaders Eat Last: Why Some Teams Pull Together and Others Don’t
- Together Is Better: A Little Book of Inspiration
- Find Your Why: A Practical Guide to Discovering Purpose for You and Your Team
- The Infinite Game

Learn more at https://simonsinek.com/books/.

company.name: The Curve

company.description: The Curve was formed to support early adopter leaders in policing to help them evolve their cultures and build their leaders. company.name: Penguin Publishing Group
company.description:
The Penguin Publishing Group is one of the leading trade book publishers in the United States, comprised of imprints with a long and rich history dating back to the nineteenth century. Penguin Books was originally founded in the UK in 1935 by Allen Lane, who envisioned a collection of quality, attractive books affordable enough to be “bought as easily and casually as a packet of cigarettes.” A United States office opened in 1939, called Penguin Books Ltd. The group merged with Putnam Berkley to become Penguin Putnam, Inc. in 1996, Penguin Group (USA) in 2003, and Penguin Publishing Group in 2014.

Today, Penguin Publishing Group is the largest division of Penguin Random House, Inc.

recommendationHistory.caption: January 28, 2020, Srinath reported directly to Ravinder
recommendationHistory.description:
"A leader is a person you will follow to a place you would not go by yourself." --Joel Barker. 
I dont know in which context Joel stated this but for me, this thought comes to my mind whenever Ravi and myself are in negotiations. 
Having joined SAP Sales team in 2018, Ravi was assigned as my manager. New company, new role and new manager is a triple whammy to any recent graduate; however within couple of months Ravi put me in ease. He lead the critical and challenging customer meetings with me and i got to see the art of putting customer at ease, live. 

With great business acumen and strategic thought process, Ravi is a great trouble shooter for all challenges and problems, both within and outside the company. 
He instills a sense of integrity towards work and is as much invested in team's development as he is for customer's.   
A rare asset in any company, Ravi earns my highest recommendation as a leader.

recommendationHistory.caption: January 26, 2020, Akshay reported directly to Ravinder
recommendationHistory.description:
Ravi is a natural leader with an uncanny ability to motivate and develop others. It is indeed wonderful working in his team as he focuses on being a great coach and a mentor. He provides a very comfortable and flexible working environment to the team. His ability to neutralize challenging customer situations and to strike a rapport with the customer instantly clearly stands out for him. I have personally learnt a lot from him in these past 2 years specifically on relationship management.
I am always in awe of Ravi’s ability to command a room and get people on board with ideas – even people who were initially on completely different pages. I thoroughly enjoy working with him and wish him all the very best.

person.headline: SVP and Head HR/ICF Certified Coach/ 2X TEDx Speaker/ Economic Times Young HR Leader/HR 100 under 40/Author/National President- Future of Work/#possibilitariangauri
person.summary:
Gauri is an engineer turned HR Professional with double Masters in  Human Resources and Psychology. With her early education in the vernacular medium in a small village and an introverted disposition, communication, and confidence weren’t her forte’ then but today she is a well-respected HR professional,  TEDx speaker,  author and has won multiple awards including Economic Times  Young HR Professional, HR 100 under 40, Top 200 Global voices in Leadership, Top 10 Global women in HR, Most followed HR Professional on social media, Linkedin person of the year, Top 10 must have connections on Linkedin, to name a few. 

Possibilitarian is the word that defines her well. She believes " Be limitless, Be a possibilitarian"

She carries 16+ years of experience in crafting and aligning HR strategy with business goals. She supports businesses in setting the right culture, driving performance, reinventing employee experience and improving capabilities. She carries a wealth of experience with both start-ups and well-established organizations. She loves high energy and a growth-focused environment.

She takes great pride in pushing people to explore their yet unknown but limitless unknown possibilities. She inspires them to use their learnings from the past to trigger their future progress and achieve life's goals. She has a track record of consistent success in leading organizational change talent management D&I talent acquisitions along with building executive teams aligned to deliver business objectives. 

Recognized for developing and implementing advanced systems and techniques aimed at automating and digitalizing HR processes, leading to improving efficiency and saving time/cost. With strong business acumen and skills in understanding and dealing with complex business situations, serves as a consultant to all levels of management. 

She mentors students and young professionals and is associated as a mentor with various institutions including IIT Bombay.  She is a passionate speaker and has graced multiple national and global forums as a keynote speaker and panellist.  She was the Lead Membership of the Professional Speakers Association of India, Mumbai chapter (PSAI).

She is on the advisory panel of various institutes and NGOs. She loves writing and her work has been published in leading publications including TOI, Economic Times, people matters, human capital etc. She is passionate about women empowerment and is leading a Leanin circle called Leaders Lifting Leaders. 

Passion with Compassion is her mantra.

She is reachable at gauri_dwivedi@rediffmail.com

recommendationHistory.caption: May 14, 2024, Anuradha was Gauri’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
Gauri has been giving me some coaching in the past few months. Her empathic style of communication combined with a super-structured, stoic approach to the actual work that happens during/after the session is great for anyone who may need gentle but firm guidance in the desired direction in their work/life. 

She brings humor, authenticity and flexibility in her role as a Coach. While we have gaps between sessions, there is enough ground she covers in each conversation to keep one occupied mentally. Overall, its a productive experience with a lovely human being.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 22, 2024, Pratishta was Gauri’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
Gauri has been an invaluable coach on my journey of professional  growth.

Gauri with her formidable smile and soft spoken personality, is extremely easy to connect with.

She possesses a unique ability to deeply listen and understand the nuances of my challenges and aspirations. Through her empathetic approach and insightful questioning, she has helped me gain clarity on my goals and develop actionable strategies to achieve them.

She prods me gently to find my own answers, while supporting and encouraging wholeheartedly

There have been so many aha moments during our sessions and it has been very exciting. The clarity and structure that she has bought in my professional life gives a quick overview of the plan to succeed.

Gauri is genuinely committed to my well-being and success.She makes sure that the Goals we work on are the ones that are truly important to me.
She gives ample space to make progress and is extremely patient.

I wholeheartedly recommend Ms.Gauri to anyone seeking transformational life coaching. Her expertise, compassion, and dedication makes her an exceptional life coach who has had a profound impact on my life.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 17, 2024, Suparna was Gauri’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
It's my pleasure to highly recommend Ms. Gauri Das for her outstanding contribution as a Key note speaker and D&I advocate on the occasion of Women’s Day at Jotun India. Her session titled "Women Rise, Men Allies" was both inspiring and enlightening.

During her talk, Gauri Mam expertly delved into crucial topics such as Self-Awareness, encouraging women to introspect and understand their own strengths, weaknesses, and biases. She emphasized the importance of Self-Acceptance, empowering women to embrace their uniqueness and celebrate diversity within themselves and others. Furthermore, her insights on Self-Growth provided actionable strategies for continuous personal and professional development.

One of the most impactful aspects of Gauri Mam’a presentation was her emphasis on the role of men as strong allies in the journey towards gender equality. She eloquently highlighted the significance of men's support in creating inclusive environments and dismantling barriers that hinder women's progress. Her call to action resonated deeply with the audience, inspiring them to actively participate in fostering a culture of equality and respect.

I extend my heartfelt gratitude to her thought-provoking session and her unwavering commitment to advancing diversity and inclusion in the workplace. Her expertise, passion, and dedication are truly commendable, and I have no doubt that she will continue to make a significant impact in this critical area.

Warm regards,
Suparna Chatterjee
HRBP - Jotun India

company.name: Cipla
company.description:
Cipla is a leading global pharmaceutical company trusted by healthcare professionals and patients across the world since 1935. A compassionate approach to healthcare that goes beyond the pursuit of profit and growth has been the force impelling Cipla’s history over the years.

Our credo and our purpose of ‘Caring for Life' continues to guide our actions towards our people and the planet for creating a sustainable future. Cipla today has presence in 80+ countries, providing over 1,500 products across various therapeutic categories in 50+ dosage forms. 

Keeping with our legacy of care, we constantly strive to ensure access to high-quality medicines that make a difference in the lives of patients. 

Our paradigm-changing offer of a triple anti-retroviral (ARV) therapy in HIV/AIDS at less than a dollar a day in Africa in 2001 was pivotal in bringing inclusiveness, accessibility and affordability to the centre of the HIV movement. 

An unmatched presence across the care continuum (awareness, prevention, diagnosis, treatment and adherence) and the widest range of drug-device combinations has established Cipla’s respiratory leadership in India and other key emerging markets. Armed with this legacy and a deep understanding of the lungs, we have articulated our aspiration to become a global lung leader and help millions breathe free.

company.name: Azentio
company.tagline: We accelerate business transformation to create lasting value leveraging innovative technology.
company.description:
Headquartered in Singapore, Azentio provides mission-critical software products across Asia Pacific, Middle East, Africa and India to banks, Islamic financial institutions, insurance companies and brokers. We also provide ERP solutions to mid-market enterprises. Our flagship platforms include Azentio ONEBanking, Azentio ONECapitalMarkets, Azentio ONEInsurance, and Azentio ONEERP. The flexibility that comes from our software platforms allows a host of applications to work with a single source of data and equips clients with workflow, analytics, document management and flexible integration mechanisms. 

Azentio has over 1000 clients in more than 48 countries. We have offices in 9 countries with a strong team of over 2000 employees. Azentio is committed to partnering with our clients globally to transform their business operations through continuous focus on innovation and best-in-class customer service. 

Azentio Software Private Limited is wholly owned by Funds advised by Apax. (https://www.apax.com)

As the Operations person, I can clearly vouch that Rahul has been effective in creating a thriving sales organization for Akamai. His command on overall business to minutest detail of transaction is exemplary followed by the ability of problem solving which is clearly demonstrated in the customer success stories. 
I wish Rahul all the success and am sure that wherever he goes, he will bring success.

Good Luck Rahul !!!

company.name: Azentio
company.tagline: We accelerate business transformation to create lasting value leveraging innovative technology.
company.description:
Headquartered in Singapore, Azentio provides mission-critical software products across Asia Pacific, Middle East, Africa and India to banks, Islamic financial institutions, insurance companies and brokers. We also provide ERP solutions to mid-market enterprises. Our flagship platforms include Azentio ONEBanking, Azentio ONECapitalMarkets, Azentio ONEInsurance, and Azentio ONEERP. The flexibility that comes from our software platforms allows a host of applications to work with a single source of data and equips clients with workflow, analytics, document management and flexible integration mechanisms. 

Azentio has over 1000 clients in more than 48 countries. We have offices in 9 countries with a strong team of over 2000 employees. Azentio is committed to partnering with our clients globally to transform their business operations through continuous focus on innovation and best-in-class customer service. 

Azentio Software Private Limited is wholly owned by Funds advised by Apax. (https://www.apax.com)

company.name: Hubhopper
company.description:
Hubhopper, the ultimate podcast platform allows users to host, manage and distribute their podcast for free. With our powerful and easy-to-use podcast creation & management tools, podcasters are able to grow their show and reach a wide target audience base through our distribution network. Which consists of platforms like Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, and Spotify. Additionally, Hubhopper's partnership with industry giants like Amazon Music, Audible, AirAsia and Paytm provides creators with maximum exposure and access to a global audience.

Hubhopper works at providing the best of features & services to podcasters, hence having developed the Hubhopper Pro plan. For a modest monthly fee, professionals can avail themselves of advanced tools and services.

Hubhopper is focused on building the podcasting community. We foster a sense of trust and transparency between the platform and its users. Our dedication to innovative technology has also helped establish our credibility among the Indian podcast community. Hubhopper is India's first podcasting platform, expanding its operations globally, it is poised to become a major player in the global podcast industry and bring the best podcasting experience to podcasters around the world. With Hubhopper, you have access to a world of untapped possibilities, and we can't wait to see where your podcasting journey with us takes you!
